thread.title: Wizz Air to open new UK base at London Luton
thread.title_full: Wizz Air to open new UK base at London Luton

title: Wizz Air to open new UK base at London Luton

organizations.name: london luton a wizz air airbus

text:
20am GMT Wizz Air to open new UK base at London Luton A Wizz Air Airbus 321 aircraft lands at the Chopin International Airport in Warsaw, Poland May 17, 2016. REUTERS/Kacper Pempel 
LONDON Budget airline Wizz Air ( WIZZ.L ) is to open a new British base at London Luton, the airline said on Thursday, with three new routes flying from June. 
The east Europe-focussed airline said that the base will open on June 18 with one new Airbus A320 aircraft. Luton will be its first UK airport with base operations, and the carrier will increase the number of routes being served from the airport to 42. 
The new routes will connect London Luton with Tel Aviv in Israel, as well as Kosovo and Georgia. 
(Reporting by Alistair Smout, Editing by Paul Sandle)
